column4: Now if I can convince my dad to move from Quickbooks to, for instance, GNUCash, so he can completely ditch win$uck
it's a GPL emulator - same thing as vmware but free
Well why don't I just use wine? or cxoffice?
wine compatabilities not perfect - otherwise, I'd run wine too
Heh, tell me about it...wine/cedega can't handle most of the decent games for win
but for serious gaming, you really need native - no way out if you need performance so dual boot is the way to go
Yea, I wish that was true
b4 upgrading to breezy - be absolutely sure to install both 'ubuntu-base' and 'ubuntu-desktop'
read the upgrade guide in wiki
is make menuconfig really that difficult in ubuntu?
depends on who's doing it - I prefer to not advise newbs to reinstall their kernel
